Rui Fang

�Not Now�

Not Now" is a visual exploration of procrastination as a subtle form of resistance in modern life. Drawing from close observations of young people�s routines, the work captures how avoidance quietly seeps into daily activities�reflecting a psychological tension between action and delay in a fast-paced world.
